name: bksr
description: Run and test your Buildkite pipeline steps locally, just as they'd run in CI, using the buildkite-agent itself.
author: Tim Lucas (http://toolmantim.com)

scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish && open "$(node -e 'p=require("./package.json"); console.log(`https://github.com/${p.repository}/releases/new?tag=v${p.version}`)')"
